mapper.select: SELECT id, date, regdate, event FROM calendar where is_use = 1
SELECT id, date, regdate, event FROM calendar where id = #{id}
SELECT id, date, regdate, event FROM calendar where is_use = 1 order by id desc limit 6
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar (date, event, regdate) VALUES (#{date}, #{event}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar set event = #{event}, date = #{date}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
mapper.delete: UPDATE calendar set is_use = 0 where id = #{id};
